answerText: Giles Goat-boy[10] A letter from Jerome Bray to another character created by this author decries the perversion of the New Syllabus into this author's Giles Goat-boy and can be found in this author's Letters. Apparently he also wrote The Floating Opera.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Virginia Commonwealth University  | 8 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this novel, Max Spielman, uses Electroencephalic Amplification and Transmission to put down Campus Riot II.  [10] Name this novel whose protagonist is the son of an artificial intelligence machine and a human female.
